messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We are building a ssstation ssshield. Posssible threatsss : SSSyndicatesss. Devilsss

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Pleassse do not sssell your sssoul. Thisss isss theft againssst you. Think about it an etrenity of sssuffering for a sssmall time with magic

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: DO NOT sssell your sssoul under any circumssstancesss

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Delia pleassse come to the brig

messages.body: Do not sssell your sssoul. If you sssell one more sssoul the devil will come out and eat usss all

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Delia pleassse come to the HoP line or you will be forcefully arresssted

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Anouncement , if you sssee a toolbox trow it in ssspace or get rid of it , you can keep the toolsss

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chief Medical Officer's Office.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Anybody who hasssnt sssould their sssoul yet you totally sssould becaussse itsss awsssome and youll be one of the cool kidsss and ssstuff

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You shitlers behave yourselves, CentCom is tired

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vault.
